Plot: Davey Stone, an alcoholic with a criminal record, is sentenced to community service under the supervision of an elderly referee. Davey is then faced with trying to reform and abandon his bad habits.
Title: Eight Crazy Nights
Writer: Brooks Arthur, Allen Covert, Brad Isaacs, Adam Sandler
Actors: Adam Sandler, Jackie Sandler, Austin Stout, Kevin Nealon
tomatoConsensus: Sandler returns to his roots in this nauseating concoction filled with potty humor and product placements.
